docs.snippet: Notions of righting wrongs and exacting revenge will add an extra pinch of spice when Ghana take on the United States on Monday in a World Cup Group G match that looks like a must win for both teams.
docs.lead_paragraph: Notions of righting wrongs and exacting revenge will add an extra pinch of spice when Ghana take on the United States on Monday in a World Cup Group G match that looks like a must win for both teams.

headline.main: U.S. Face World Cup Nemesis Ghana in Natal Opener
headline.print_headline: U.S. Face World Cup Nemesis Ghana in Natal Opener

docs.snippet: England knew surviving a group with two other former World Cup champions would be tough, but the team never expected to be trailing Costa Rica after the opening games.
docs.lead_paragraph: England knew surviving a group with two other former World Cup champions would be tough, but the team never expected to be trailing Costa Rica after the opening games.

headline.main: Costa Rica Upsets Uruguay at World Cup
headline.print_headline: Costa Rica Upsets Uruguay at World Cup

docs.snippet: Honduras coach Luis Suarez says his team may be an outsider, even "the Cinderella of our group", but he rejects any suggestion it plays dirty.

headline.main: Honduras Coach Says Team Not Violent

docs.snippet: A cool-headed Italy proved too clever for England on Saturday, scoring two well-crafted goals and defending doggedly in the Amazon heat to grab a 2-1 win in their opening World Cup Group D game.
docs.lead_paragraph: A cool-headed Italy proved too clever for England on Saturday, scoring two well-crafted goals and defending doggedly in the Amazon heat to grab a 2-1 win in their opening World Cup Group D game.

headline.main: Cool Italy Outwit England to Win 2-1 in the Heat
headline.print_headline: Cool Italy Outwit England to Win 2-1 in the Heat

docs.snippet: The heat and humidity of the jungle made its mark on the first World Cup match to be played in the Amazon rainforest, and so did Mario Balotelli.
docs.lead_paragraph: The heat and humidity of the jungle made its mark on the first World Cup match to be played in the Amazon rainforest, and so did Mario Balotelli.

headline.main: Balotelli Goal Gives Italy 2-1 Win Over England
headline.print_headline: Balotelli Goal Gives Italy 2-1 Win Over England

docs.snippet: Rarely has a loss provided so much optimism for England.
docs.lead_paragraph: Rarely has a loss provided so much optimism for England.

headline.main: Optimism for England Despite Opening With Loss
headline.print_headline: Optimism for England Despite Opening With Loss

docs.snippet: Bosnia-Herzegovina will make its World Cup debut against a two-time world champion led by one of the greatest players in the game at the legendary Maracana stadium.

docs.snippet: Mario Balotelli scored with a second-half header Saturday to give Italy a 2-1 win over England at the World Cup.

docs.snippet: Italian experience overcame England's youthful exuberance in an intriguing clash of styles at the World Cup on Saturday and in Group D's other game unfancied Costa Rica beat twice champions Uruguay in the tournament's biggest upset so far.

headline.main: Wily Italy Outfox England, Costa Rica Stun Uruguay
headline.print_headline: Wily Italy Outfox England, Costa Rica Stun Uruguay

docs.snippet: England manager Roy Hodgson found it hard to take losing to Italy in their opening World Cup game on Saturday after what he called the best performance of his two years in charge of the team.

headline.main: Hodgson Takes England Loss Hard Despite Youthful Promise
